accept.title: Acceptance & Updates
accept.body: By downloading and using the app you accept these terms. Rules may be updated from time to time; keeping up with in-app announcements is your responsibility.

fair_use.title: Fair Play
fair_use.body: Cheating, automation, or behaviour that breaks the balance of the game is forbidden. Keep your device and credentials private to protect your account.

paid_content.title: Paid Content
paid_content.body: Some cosmetic or booster bundles may be paid. Purchases follow your store provider's refund policy, and we reserve the right to cancel suspicious orders.

liability.title: Liability Disclaimer
liability.body: The app is provided "as is". We cannot be held responsible for losses caused by interruptions, data corruption, or failures of third-party services.

data_collection.title: Collected Data
data_collection.body: Your progress, scores, and the optional nickname you provide are stored locally. Analytics and crash reports stay anonymous and aren't linked to device identifiers.

data_use.title: Data Usage
data_use.body: We use this information to improve gameplay, fix technical issues, and plan new features. Data is never shared with advertisers.

retention.title: Retention Period
retention.body: Local saves remain on your device. If cloud sync is enabled, data is stored until you delete your account or stay inactive for 24 months.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.body: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your data. Contact support via the in-app feedback panel to exercise these rights.
